properties.name: Description
properties.description: A string containing the description of the group.

type.description: A string containing the description of the group.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.

type.description: A string containing the name of the group. This value is commonly displayed when the group is referenced.

properties.name: IdentityStoreId
properties.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

type.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

properties.name: GroupId
properties.description: The unique identifier for a group in the identity store.

type.description: The unique identifier for a group in the identity store.
